snippet: The rate for the euro zone countries reached 12.2 percent in April, bringing the total number of unemployed job-seekers to 19.4 million.
lead_paragraph: The rate for the euro zone countries reached 12.2 percent in April, bringing the total number of unemployed job-seekers to 19.4 million.

headline.main: Unemployment Hits Record High in Euro Zone
headline.print_headline: Unemployment Hits Record High in Euro Zone
